welcome_message_body: Welcome to La Verne, the charming city nestled in the foothills of the San Gabriel Mountains. Known for its quaint downtown and friendly community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a cafeteria, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport is used for chartered flights and offers a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Whiteman Airport caters to private and corporate jets, offering exclusive amenities and services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Daugherty Field Terminal
terminals.description: The Daugherty Field Terminal handles general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norton AFB Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Norton AFB Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at John Wayne Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at John Wayne Airport is primarily used for domestic flights and offers a modern and convenient travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
